channel.title: PKScapeX ~ Not your average Server!
channel.description:
l [u][b]About PKScapeX[/b][/u] l
PKScapeX is under development, and will [u][b]not[/b][/u] be stopped!
The server is hosted on a 24/7 VPS with 960mb of RAM and a 3.0Ghz Processor, meaning the server can hold 100 - 120 people at a time, with no lag! I aiming to own one of the best PKing Servers but this will not be boring, it will also be fully non-pk, it's going to have a full economy, good items will be rare drops from monsters, the best items coming from hard monsters in dungeons which require a rare coloured key, and a certain slayer level!
Rares will remain rare, i haven't yet thought of a relevant way to get them but i will, don't worry! There will also be membership! Member's will be able to get access to a members only island (AKA Waterbirth Island) which has member's only shops, new monsters to train on and much, much more!
I'll admit i am not the best of coders but if i do say so i have done a good job by myself up to now, but i've decided to recruit, so the server is done quicker!
l [u][b]Coder's List[/b][/u] l
~Ryan
l [u][b]How to become a Coder[/b][/u] l
I am sorry but atm i am only accepting good coders, i don't want to be taking people who don't know what they're doing, as it will slow down the development of the server, and won't really help much.
If you know quite a bit of java and think you can help, you can add my MSN which can be found at the bottom of the thread, and we can talk on there, alternatively you can post here!
l [u][b]Thanks[/b][/u] l
Thanks for reading, Ryan ~ Owner of PKScapeX [i]stanyer7@hotmail.co.uk[/i]
